title: Well Enough Alone: A Cultural History of My Hypochondria
description: Traces the author's personal struggles with hypochondria as well as the condition's history and broader cultural context, in an account that describes current misunderstandings about hypochondria, the non-threatening health challenges that fed her paranoid self-diagnoses of more dire illnesses, and her efforts to embrace a healthier outlook. 40,000 first printing.
author: Jennifer Traig
